effect_entries.effect: During a [sandstorm]{mechanic:sandstorm}, this Pokémon's []{type:rock}-, []{type:ground}-, and []{type:steel}-type moves have 1.3× their base power.  This Pokémon does not take sandstorm damage, regardless of type.
effect_entries.short_effect: Strengthens []{type:rock}, []{type:ground}, and []{type:steel} moves to 1.3× their power during a [sandstorm]{mechanic:sandstorm}.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
砂あらしで　威力が
あがる　技がある。

Boosts certain moves’
power in a sandstorm.

Potenzia alcune mosse nelle
tempeste di sabbia.

Potencia algunos movimientos
durante las tormentas de arena.

Manche Attacken wirken
in Sandstürmen besser.

Renforce des capacités en cas
de tempête de sable.

すなあらしで　いりょくが
あがる　わざがある。

Boosts certain moves’
power in a sandstorm.

Boosts certain moves’
power in a sandstorm.

Renforce des capacités en
cas de tempête de sable.
